name: Hunger Story!
description:
Physics based cookie hunting game. Hunger Story! is a strategic fun arcade game in which you have to help your fox reach his cookie so that he could overcome his hunger. It requires good skills because you have to use the given amount of balls that lets your fox to bounce off the ball and reach the cookie.

You can choose between two cool modes :
* CLASSIC MODE - A normal arcade high score based level game mode.
* ENDLESS MODE - A health based survival high score based game mode.

You will have two power ups in each level in classic mode :
* BOOST
* SLOW MOTION

Make sure you use the power ups effectively or you are going to be in trouble.
Also , there are four characters in the game :
* FOX
* SANTA
* NINJA
* ZOMBIE

That is it? No.
You will have your own Hunger Story! profile with a unique ID number. You can check your stats in your profile. Compare it with your friends and show them who is the boss.
*You can always use your ID number to restore your progress in case of account loss or device change. Your progress will be saved automatically*

Start your Hunger Story! today and wipe out the hunger off of you and your loved ones. Realize how hard an individual has to fight for a cookie.

*DO NOT WASTE FOOD*
